definition: to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: This paper introduces the fault diagnostic expert system that includes system structure, function and self-study capacity for gas generator.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一个适用于燃气轮机的故障诊断专家系统。

sentences.english: GE will provide four gas turbine modules per vessel.
sentences.chinese: 通用海事公司将为每艘舰艇提供四种燃气轮机模块。

sentences.english: The gas turbine feeds on the fuel it pumps.
sentences.chinese: 这台燃气轮机以它抽入的燃料为能源。

sentences.english: The gas turbine generating sets for co-production of power and heat is introduced as a focal point.
sentences.chinese: 重点介绍了利用燃气轮机组实现热电联供。

sentences.english: A brief introduction is being made to the development status of industrial gas turbines both at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 简要地介绍了国内外工业燃气轮机的发展情况。

sentences.english: The increase of the gas turbine work ratio is mostly demonstrated by the increase of the turbine initial temperature.
sentences.chinese: 燃气轮机效率的提高，主要表现在透平初温的提高。

sentences.english: Narrated the application of gas-turbine drive water injection pump.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了燃气轮机在油田拖动注水泵的应用情况。

sentences.english: This paper summarized the methods of decreasing NOx emission from gas turbine .
sentences.chinese: 阐述了燃气轮机降低氮氧化物排放的方法。

sentences.english: This article reveals the market situation on gas turbine produced by SIEMENS.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了德国西门子公司的燃气轮机的市场情况。

sentences.english: Nonlinear mathematical models for a steam-injected gas turbine are drived in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文建立了回注蒸汽型燃气轮机的非线性数学模型。

sentences.english: The gas-fired turbine is safe, clean, more efficient than competing technologies, and uncontroversial .
sentences.chinese: 燃气轮机安全，干净，一致认为比其他技术更有效率。

sentences.english: In cruise, the gas turbine powers the fans and recharges the batteries.
sentences.chinese: 在巡航时，燃气轮机为风扇供电并为电池充电。

sentences.english: In a steam turbine, the steam pushes against blades.
sentences.chinese: 在燃气轮机里，水蒸汽推动的是叶片。

sentences.english: A thermal generating set driven by a gas turbine.
sentences.chinese: 原动机为燃气轮机的热力发电机组。

sentences.english: The recuperator is one of the main components of the micro turbine in energy island system.
sentences.chinese: 回热器是能源岛系统中微型燃气轮机的一个主要部件。

sentences.english: The distributed energy system driven by micro-turbine is introduced in this work.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了微型燃气轮机驱动的分布式能源系统。

pinyin: wo1 lun2 zhou2 fa1 dong4 ji1
wo1 lun2 pen1 qi4 fa1 dong4 ji1

definition: aircraft carrier/abbr. for 航空母艦|航空母舰[hang2 kong1 mu3 jian4]
